alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 14 at 9:34PM EST until January 15 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches in the most persistent lake snows. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph will produce extensive blowing and drifting snow through about midnight. Winds will then diminish overnight. * WHERE...The Eastern Lake Ontario Region. Greatest additional accumulations will be across central Jefferson and northern Lewis counties. * WHEN...Until 1 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult within this band of lake effect snow with deep snow cover on roads and very poor visibility.
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
